data.name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Character Pass
data.detailed_description:
Purchase seven different Character Packs as a set.
The Character Pass will include all additional content that is scheduled to be released by the end of December 2022.

[Set Details]
Tengen Uzui Character Pack
Nezuko Kamado (Advanced Demon Form) Character Pack
Tanjiro Kamado (Entertainment District) Character Pack
Zenitsu Agatsuma (Entertainment District) Character Pack
Inosuke Hashibira (Entertainment District) Character Pack
Daki Character Pack
Gyutaro Character Pack

  • The main game (sold separately) is required to access this content, as well as the latest patch.
  • Character Pass contents will be released as separate products at a later date. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
  • Content details and release dates are subject to change.
  • The content/specs may change without warning.
  • Game illustrations for each character are based on the in-game 3D models created by CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.

fullgame.name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD Phenom ll X6 1100T
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2GB | AMD Radeon HD 7950, 3GB
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low 720p (30FPS)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2GB | AMD Radeon R9 280, 4GB
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High 1080p (30FPS), 8 GB RAM (60FPS)
